description: Coverman Rafael Alencar (is he one of the hottest men alive????) shows his true side in his FISTING DEBUT performance. Rafael loves fisting and has been asking us for years to let him do a handball movie. Why on earth did we ever say no???? We made up for lost time by pairing him with Exclusive Sean Harris, that hairy hunk who carried the ball for us during our smash-hit Construction Zone Trilogy from last year. If you have not seen Sean Harris yet, you are going to love him. He is Mark Everett reincarnated! His amazing hole is matched only by his warm smile and Greek-god body! Rafael, with his huge cock and muscular arms, is his perfect foil. These guys look like a million bucks, and this scene is one of the greats. This pairing alone has more action than an entire movie put out by our closest competitors! Slings, tables, standing, sitting, yelling and snarling-- what you get here is hardcore action that you will enjoy over and over and over again! You are really going to like how Rafael works Sean's expanding asshole! Indeed, it is a sight to behold!
title: Fistpack 6 - Can Openers, Scene #01
